10 - Plane of Elemental Power

Tinkerer retires after killing his final 2 enemy types (Sun Demon, Flame Demon). 

Farewell, Tink (Googly Wrinkla)

Hello, Vermling Beast Tyrant (Rattigan Doolittle) ?

Farewell, Spellweaver (Katelaya)

Hello, Quatryl Soothsinger (John Slayer) #bgstats
plays.title: Plane of Elemental Power

plays.comments:
4 - Crypt of the Damned

What we hoped would be a "quick, easy scenario" turned out to be a grind of cultists summoning enemies left, right and centre.

Some fantastic moves from Cragheart and Brute, but the Spellweaver was on the point of death from the first opened door and my Tinkerer felt underwhelming until the end.

We split in the corridor and I managed to lay enough traps to finish the last enemy with my final card - a single bad modifier would have lost us the game.

After that, the Brute was forced to retire, so our party now has the Human Sawbones (Oliver) who sounds... interesting ? #bgstats
plays.title: Crypt of the Damned

plays.comments:
11 - Gloomhaven Square A

Our tactic of running like a mad bastard worked well. Let the living bones and corpses tank the damage behind us.

Ended up knocking out the big boss in a couple of turns, once we got to him.

Strangely easy - and now the militaristic rule of Gloomhaven is toppled! #bgstats
plays.title: Gloomhaven Square A

plays.comments:
11 - Gloomhaven Square A

Too many AI decisions to make, we really needed the app to help track everything. 

Got to the boss and nabbed the treasure chest after running past everyone and letting our allies do the work.

Sadly we were all exhausted before doing even half the damage needed to beat the boss. Plus we were all drunk and tired by then. #bgstats
plays.title: Gloomhaven Square A

plays.comments:
3 - Inox Encampment

We fought hard and eventually got to the last enemies we needed to beat. I had a plan to trap the enemies in a room with a trap, but Amber ran into the middle of that room. She was sacrificed for the good of the party but we all won in the end. #bgstats
plays.title: Inox Encampment
